title: 20 min TOTAL BODY STRETCH ROUTINE | Muscle Recovery, Flexibility and Relaxation
description:
Join me for a 20 minute TOTAL BODY STRETCH ROUTINE for muscle recovery and relaxation. Do this sequence after your workout or on your rest day. We'll perform mostly static stretches with a few flowing movements throughout. You'll recognize a couple of familiar YOGA postures within the routine as well. So grab your mat and let's get stretching! 💞 xox Mik

EQUIPMENT:
- Mat 


💞 WINTER WORKOUT CHALLENGE 2023 💞

WEEK 8 PLAYLIST:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3D3ysBMhKYU7E70LyvW_CTibLr4na6GM

#stretch #musclerecovery #relaxation
channelDescription:
Hey! My name is Mikala, but you might know me as fitbymik! I am a fitness instructor, personal trainer, dancer and aerialist born and raised in Toronto Canada. I have a passion for health and fitness that lead me to a Bachelors Degree in Kinesiology, and over a decade of teaching in the fitness industry. Some of the class genres I have taught include Barre Fitness, Strength and Conditioning, Yoga, Pilates, Zumba, Aquafit, dance and gymnastics. I also have years of expertise with one-on-one personal training and fitness coaching. One of my favourite things about this industry is the ability to help others achieve their goals and feel their best!

In between teaching and learning, I spent many years performing as a dancer and aerialist with Norwegian Cruise Line. I also performed as an aerialist at Tokyo Disney Resort in Japan!

I can’t wait to continue bringing more workouts and challenges to help YOU reach your fitness and flexibility goals!

comments: Your routines always feel like a gift to myself. always exactly what my body needs, no more, no less.

Thanks! I wish I knew this was an option earlier. Again thank you for another month of our “Winter Workout”Kristina and I are looking forward to March and texting each other the videos we choose! You rock ❤️ Melissa
Your workouts have been a changing point for me in my health journey.  Thank you!  If you can, please offer more 20 minute stretch routines.  Your variety is so good!

Such a wonderful stretch that allowed me to lengthen and relax my muscles while calming my mind. I was totally in the moment throughout this session and now, I am feeling terrific!! Beautiful way to finish the Winter Workout Challenge 2023!!
Week 8/Day 6 is done and the challenge is done in its entirety!!
